schema.description:
权限策略名称。

长度为1~128个字符，可包含英文字母、数字和短横线（-）。

400.errorMessage: The policy name contains invalid characters. It must only contain upper or lower case letters, numbers, and dash (-).
The length of the policy name is invalid. It must be 1 to 128 characters in length.

409.errorMessage: Before deleting the policy, it may not be attached to any user.
The policy cannot be attached to any group when you delete it.
You must delete all non-default versions before you delete the policy.

title: 删除权限策略
summary: 调用DeletePolicy删除指定的权限策略。
description:
> - 删除权限策略前，必须删除此权限策略的非默认版本。关于如何删除权限策略版本，请参见[DeletePolicyVersion](~~159041~~)。
> - 删除权限策略前，应保证当前权限策略未被引用（即未授予RAM用户、用户组或RAM角色）。关于如何移除授权，请参见[DetachPolicy](~~159168~~)。
